means: 使减速(retard的过去式和过去分词)
阻碍（某人/某事物）的进步或发展

sentence.Network_en: The progression of the disease can be retarded by early surgery.
sentence.Network_cn: 早期手术可以抑制病情的发展。

sentence.Network_en: He was so slow that many thought him mentally retarded.
sentence.Network_cn: 他迟钝得很,许多人以为他智力低下.

sentence.Network_en: Her death was retarded by five years because of good treatment.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于良好的治疗,她多活了五年.

entry.tran: 智力迟钝的;智力发育迟缓的
entry.def: Someone who is retarded is much less advanced mentally than most people of their age.

example.ex: ...a special school for mentally retarded children.
example.tran: 为智障孩子设立的特殊学校

means.word_mean: 1. relatively slow in mental or emotional or physical development;

means.word_mean: (尤指儿童)(智力)发育迟缓的, 弱智的

sentences.en: Lucy is very retarded and can't read yet.
sentences.cn: 露西在智力方面发育十分迟缓, 至今还不识字。
